  • Features
  • Parameters Engineering
    • Bootstrapped parameters

  • Variable/Feature Reduction
    • How many factors to retain in Factor Analysis (FA)
    • Variable extraction (PCA, FA, ...)
    • Variable selection (stepwise, projpred, ...)

Numeric Values Formatting

format_value.Rd

Numeric Values Formatting

format_value(x, digits = 2, protect_integers = FALSE, missing = "",
  ...)

Arguments

x

Numeric value.
digits

Number of significant digits.
protect_integers

Should integers be kept as integers (i.e., without decimals)?
missing

Value by which `NA` values are replaced. By default, an empty string (i.e. "") is returned for `NA`.
...

Arguments passed to or from other methods.

Value

A formatted string.

Examples

format_value(1.20)
#> [1] "1.20"
format_value(1.2)
#> [1] "1.20"
format_value(1.2012313)
#> [1] "1.20"
format_value(c(0.0045, 234, -23))
#> [1] "0.00"   "234.00" "-23.00"

format_value(as.factor(c("A", "B", "A")))
#> Warning: invalid factor level, NA generated
#> Warning: invalid factor level, NA generated
#> Warning: invalid factor level, NA generated
#> Warning: invalid factor level, NA generated
#> Warning: invalid factor level, NA generated
#> [1] A B A
#> Levels: A B
format_value(iris$Species)
#> Warning: invalid factor level, NA generated

format_value(3)
#> [1] "3.00"
format_value(3, protect_integers = TRUE)
#> [1] "3"
